question: Which organization has set up a 5-member panel to review the charter of its laboratories?
explanation:
Defence Research and Development Organisation (DRDO) has constituted a 5-member panel headed by V Ramagopal Rao (Director of Indian Institute of Technology, Delhi) to review the charter of its laboratories.
The panel has been set up by the DRDO chief G Satheesh Reddy. The panel is required to submit its report within 45 days. The panel is mandated to suggest measures to implement ‘Atmanirbhar Bharat Abhiyan’ in Defence sector and to reduce the dependence on imported weapons.
